charges.charge_disposition: The deft. is hereby committed to the custody of the U.S. Bureau of Prisons to be imprisoned for a term of seventy (70) months on counts 1 and 2 to run concurrently; thirty (3)) years on count 3, to consecutively to terms under counts 1 and 2. Resentencing: The dft. is hereby committed to the custody of the U.S. Bureau of Prisons to be imprisoned for a term of Eighty-Seven (87) months on each of Counts 1 and 2, to run concurrently, Time served to count. (1s)
